name: GO TO HER
description:
You wake up in a small room with no windows or doors . . . To your left is a man, lying on the ground and facing the wall . . . Is he dead . . ? Is he waiting for you . . ? You don't know which is worse . . . You hear a voice . . .  It is only in your head, but it trembles with wisdom and untold wrath . . . "Go . . ." "To . . ." "Her . . . " You know what to do . . .

Go To Her is a game about getting close to your enemies in order to betray them later on. Follow the protagonist in his quest to solve the mysteries of this strange, post-apocalyptic Earth he has found himself in and his plight to find the mysterious "Her".

NOTE: This is just a demo, as the final project is still in development. As such, nothing contained within this demo should be considered final and everything is subject to change.
